## This website contains:
- a tutorial for running rule-based learning with single-cell transcriptions data
- a snipet that allows to assume direction for interactions in rule-based model

## Prerequisits:
- R / RStudio
- Installing following R packages: R.ROSETTA, igraph, VisuNet, Seurat, biomaRt, AnnotationDbi, org.Mm.eg.db, fitdistrplus, tidyverse, ggplot2, ggpubr, ggplotify, dplyr
